<<<api>>>: ProgressDialog.dismiss
<<<code>>>: 
@Override
protected void onPostExecute(String file_url) {
    System.out.println("Downloaded");
    if (progressDialog != null && progressDialog.isShowing()) {
        progressDialog.dismiss();
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: In the onPostExecute method, you should check if the ProgressDialog is not null and is showing before calling dismiss on it. This will prevent crashes if the ProgressDialog is not currently showing.
